content: two identical leaf shapes out of white felt hot glue them on to black felt cut the black felt to create an even border glue these eyes into place on the head spider embroidery using thin black yarn or embroidery thread embroider a spider onto the chest this sketch shows how i embroidered mine there are many spider logos and variations that may work as well or better for you pattern by *brinady* this is a free pattern you may share it freely and sell the items you make please do not sell the pattern it is a free pattern
